com.topcoder.rules.engine
Interface RulesEngineServer

All Superinterfaces:
RulesConstants
All Known Implementing Classes:
RulesEngineServerImpl
public interface RulesEngineServer
extends RulesConstants

The RulesEngineServer provides shared access to RulesEngines through RMI.

See Also:
RulesEngineServerImpl, RulesEngine

Method Detail

getRulesEngine

public RulesEngine getRulesEngine(java.lang.Long ruleSetID)
                           throws RemoteException
Gets the RulesEngine for the given RuleSet.

Parameters:
ruleSetID - The unique identifier of the RuleSet
Returns:
the RulesEngine
Throws:
RemoteException - if there is a problem instantiating the RulesEngine

getExistingRulesEngine

public RulesEngine getExistingRulesEngine(java.lang.Long ruleSetID)
                                   throws RemoteException
Gets the RulesEngine for the given RuleSet only if it already exists.

Parameters:
ruleSetID - The unique identifier of the RuleSet
Returns:
the RulesEngine if it already exits, otherwise return null
Throws:
RemoteException - if there is a problem instantiating the RulesEngine
